Yah, I've talked with Gabe Wachod about this, who's gone out of his way
to be accomodating of my views.  He may be fuzzy on the technical side,
but he's very aware of the tension.  IIRC, he said they'd remove the
REST reference.

I think we can safely ignore this group.  It seems like they exist to
rubber stamp XNS, which IMO doesn't stand a chance of getting deployed.

MB
